projects.name: Project Alpha
projects.description: A full-stack web application built with React and Node.js featuring real-time data synchronization.

about.text:
>>> BIO.TXT

I'm a creative developer who loves blending modern technology with nostalgic aesthetics. With a background in both design and development, I create web experiences that are both functional and memorable.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring retro tech, playing vintage video games, or experimenting with creative coding projects.

Specializations:
- Frontend Development
- UI/UX Design
- Retro Computing
- Creative Coding
